title: Brother’s Best Enemy
description: Tinsel is the town sheriff in Troping and she loves her job. The only downside is her brother’s best friend Jack, who also happens to be her nemesis. He does everything he can to get under her skin, but she’s always got a ticket ready to pass out to annoy him right back.Jack has been in love with Tinsel since his best friend first brought him home for the holidays. The only problem is keeping his distance when all he wants to do is hold her close. For years he’s kept his control, but it’s not going to last much longer. How can a woman who is hell-bent on making his life miserable be the woman of his dreams?Warning: Enemies to lovers and brother’s best friend were never so much fun! Come with us to Troping, where you’ll find all the best stories!
author: Alexa Riley
